title: Looking for Clash teammates

embed.description: Mr Silly / Silver 1 44LP / 64W 63L Win Ratio 50% / Xin Zhao - 15W 12L Win Ratio 56%, Morgana - 13W 7L Win Ratio 65%, Akali - 8W 9L Win Ratio 47%, Xerath - 6W 8L Win Ratio 43%, Swain - 6W 6L Win Ratio 50%

body:
Hi there,

Mr Silly here, looking for a team for the new tournament mode Clash. I am a S1 JG {{champion:5}} {{champion:54}}  {{champion:141}} and Sup {{champion:25}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:89}} main. Any teams out there looking for an extra or anyone wanting to join me either post here or add me in game - Mr Silly.

I look forward to seeing you on the rift.

Cheers

replies.body: Hey dude pretty sure we need a 5th for clash add gator and Iâ€™ll talk to you more about it this will be a silver-gold 5 team so you fit pretty well
